name: Paper Flight (itch)
description:
Paper Flight is a VR experiential flight through a majestic tundra landscape. Experience this frozen environment from a unique perspective and enjoy the northern lights in virtual reality!

Made by a small group of students at Columbia College Chicago.

Product Manager – Duncan McDonald

Technical Lead – David Nichol

Lead Artist – Brian Rosner

Faculty Advisors – Bill Guschwan & Alex Damarjian

3D Artists-

  • Rashad Patterson
  • Marcus Bounds jr.

Illustrators-

  • Cindy Chau

Designers-

  • Tyler Campo

Lead Audio Designer/SFX Designer-

  • Zoe Maddix

Composers-

  • Gilbert Marin
  • Peter Li

  • Harrison Maine
  • Jake Reilly
